level.heading: Separability.
level.text: Should any provision of this chapter be declared unconstitutional, invalid or beyond the statutory authority of the Council of the District, the remaining provisions of this chapter shall be unaffected by such a declaration.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 2-139
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-139, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 1-601.01.
